title: Haimont Men's Workout Tank Top Dry Fit UPF 50 Sleeveless Muscle Tee Shirts for Swim, Running, Hiking, Beach
description: UPF50+ Protects Your Skin: Haimont mens tank tops with UPF50+ sun protection is designed to avoid UVB rays from damaging your skin, giving you enough protection in any outdoor activity in hot summer
Four Way Stretch: Our men tank top with lightweight and 4-way stretch fabric to provide much freedom of movement, which suitable for various body types with breathability and comfort

Moisture-wicking & Breathable: Mens tank top undershirt is made using 100% polyester fabric, moisture-wicking and breathable, which moves sweat away from the skin, keeping you cool and dry during exercising
Exquisite Details: Easy hand-tear tag prevent from irritation and abrasions; Low arm hole, sleeveless design and smooth flatlock seams for great flexibility and comfort

Versatile Activewear: Mens tank tops is suitable for gym, running, swimming, sports, basketball, soccer, weightlifting, cycling, hiking, camping, travel and various other activities. It is a good companion for home or out. Machine/Hand Washable
